meanings.sent1: The premade sandwiches were perfect for a quick lunch.
meanings.sent2: I bought a premade cake for the party.
meanings.sent3: The premade excuse for being late was that the dog ate my homework.
meanings.sent4: Her premade decision to leave the job surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The premade itinerary made the trip planning so much easier.

meanings.definition: Something that is already made or prepared before being sold or used.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using premade dough for baking.
meanings.sent2: The store sells premade meals for busy families.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked that his secret ingredient was premade magic.
meanings.sent4: The premade solution to the problem saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The premade costume was a hit at the costume party.
